---
title: "CEAP Analysis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv(here::here("data/dadosCEAP.csv"),
                 progress = F,
                 col_types = cols(
                   nomeParlamentar = col_character(),
                   idCadastro = col_integer(),
                   sgUF = col_character(),
                   sgPartido = col_character(),
                   tipoDespesa = col_character(),
                   especDespesa = col_character(),
                   fornecedor = col_character(),
                   CNPJCPF = col_character(),
                   tipoDocumento = col_integer(),
                   dataEmissao = col_datetime(format = ""),
                   valorDocumento = col_double(),
                   valorGlosa = col_integer(),
                   valorLíquido = col_double()))

data %>%
  glimpse()
```

# Which parliamentarians spent the most from the CEAP budget? Which spent less? 

```{r}
data %>%
  group_by(idCadastro,
           nomeParlamentar) %>%
  summarise(total_expense = sum(valorLíquido)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  top_n(n=20, wt=total_expense) %>%
  ggplot(aes(reorder(nomeParlamentar,
                     total_expense),
             total_expense)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0, y = total_expense, 
                 xend = nomeParlamentar, 
                 yend = total_expense),
               color = "grey50",
               size=0.4) +
  geom_point() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(y="Total Expense (R$)", x="Parliamentarian name")
```

```{r}
data %>%
  group_by(idCadastro,
           nomeParlamentar) %>%
  summarise(total_expense = sum(valorLíquido)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(total_expense >= 0) %>%
  arrange(total_expense) %>%
  slice(1:20) %>%
  ggplot(aes(reorder(nomeParlamentar,
                     total_expense),
             total_expense)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0, y = total_expense,
                   xend = nomeParlamentar,
                   yend = total_expense),
               color = "grey50",
               size=0.5) +
  geom_point() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(y="Total Expense (R$)", 
       x="Parliamentarian name")
```
